JWT_SECRET.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

DATABASE.description: Go to https://cloud.mongodb.com create a database and generate access url with sufficient permission and paste here. It will be in the format `mongodb+srv://<username>:<password>@<host>`

CLOUDINARY_URL.description: Go to https://cloudinary.com create an accout and from dashboard paste access url. It will be in the format `cloudinary://<access>:<secret>@<cloud>`
